sentences.en: Catching colds is unfortunately an occupational hazard in this profession.
sentences.cn: 不幸的是，容易感冒是这个行业的职业性风险。

sentences.en: He unfortunately passed away last year.
I like cats but unfortunately I'm allergic to them.
sentences.cn: 我喜欢猫，但遗憾的是我对猫过敏。

sentences.en: The enclosed photograph is unfortunately not good enough to reproduce.
sentences.cn: 遗憾的是，附寄的照片不够清晰，无法复制。

sentences.en: Unfortunately I'm not suitably dressed for gardening.
sentences.cn: 不幸的是，我的着装不适合做园艺活。
不幸的是这些肖像都是骗人的。

sentences.en: Unfortunately, bad news has come hard on the heels of good.
sentences.cn: 很遗憾，好消息的后面紧跟着就是坏消息。

sentences.en: Unfortunately, due to unforeseen circumstances, this year's show has been cancelled.
sentences.cn: 遗憾的是，由于一些意外情况，今年的演出被取消了。

sentences.en: Unfortunately, Grandma always seems to awaken at awkward moments.
sentences.cn: 不幸的是，奶奶好像总是醒来的不是时候。

sentences.en: Unfortunately, his partners were crooks and absconded with the funds.
sentences.cn: 不幸的是，他的合伙人都是些骗子，已卷款逃之夭夭了。

sentences.en: Unfortunately, no one took my messages seriously.
sentences.cn: 遗憾的是，没人把我提供的信息当回事。

sentences.en: Unfortunately, the entire evening was a total non-event.
sentences.cn: 遗憾的是，整个晚上都没什么特别有趣的事。

sentences.en: Unfortunately, the text is sprinkled with errors.
sentences.cn: 遗憾的是，文本中零星地有一些错误。

sentences.en: Unfortunately, there is little prospect of seeing these big questions answered.
sentences.cn: 不幸的是，几乎不可能看到这些重大问题得到回复。

sentences.en: Unfortunately, this happy story finishes on a more sombre note.
sentences.cn: 遗憾的是，这个快乐的故事结局却比较伤感。

sentences.en: Unfortunately, you were out when we called.
sentences.cn: 很遗憾，我们来的时候你出去了。

words.tran_cn: 不幸的；令人遗憾的；不成功的

trans.tran_en: used when you are mentioning a fact that you wish was not true
